typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as string,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as string,
		Rating as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(updateIf(Title==Title)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'dlsfssynap1',
	folderPath: 'target',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Title','YEAR'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		movies as string,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as string,
		Rating as string
	),
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'dlsfssynap1',
	folderPath: 'target',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Title'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
